title: Ready to Create Drop?
description: Complete below to configure your Drop

retentionOptions.deleteOnAccess: Delete Drop immediately after downloaded or copied
retentionOptions.keep30Minutes: Keep the Drop for 30 minutes then delete
retentionOptions.keep1Hour: Keep the Drop for 1 hour then delete

noteText: Each Drop is securely encrypted and stored according to your settings â€” you'll receive a magic key to retrieve it anytime within your selected retention period.
